Module it.unipr.shopfx

Package it.unipr.controllers.employee

package it.unipr.controllers.employee
This package contains all the classes needed for the management of the employee interface Through the four controllers, EmploueeController, OrderController, PersonController, ProductController, all the functionalities of the employee and administrator are covered. Managing the warehouse, orders, user accounts and employee accounts.
Since:
2.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Tanzi Manuel 307720, Mamone Maximiliano 308214
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    EmployeeController
    This class provides all the necessary methods to manage the employee interface
    OrderController
    This class provides all the necessary methods to fill and manage an order row in the employee interface
    PersonController
    This class provides all the necessary methods to fill and manage a person row in the employee interface
    ProductController
    This class provides all the necessary methods to fill and manage a product row in the employee interface
